Name: loudoun_2008_hszones
LayerDisplayName: High School Attendance Zones, Loudoun County, VA 2008
Originator: Loudoun County Public Schools, VA, Department of Planning and Legislative Services
OriginatorSort: Loudoun County Public Schools, VA, Department of Planning and Legislative Services
Abstract: This file contains every high school attendance zone for the Loudoun County Public School System (LCPS).  These attendance zones are updated on a yearly basis and are valid for the current school year only.
FgdcText:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<metadata>
  <idinfo>
    <citation>
      <citeinfo>
        <origin>Loudoun County Public Schools, VA, Department of Planning and Legislative Services</origin>
        <pubdate>20080701</pubdate>
        <title>High School Attendance Zones, Loudoun County, VA 2008</title>
        <geoform>vector digital data</geoform>
        <pubinfo>
          <pubplace>Leesburg, VA</pubplace>
          <publish>Loudoun County, VA</publish>
        </pubinfo>
        <onlink>http://www.loudoun.gov/</onlink>
      <ftname Sync="TRUE">loudoun_2008_hszones</ftname>
</citeinfo>
    </citation>
    <descript>
      <abstract>This file contains every high school attendance zone for the Loudoun County Public School System (LCPS).  These attendance zones are updated on a yearly basis and are valid for the current school year only.</abstract>
      <purpose>The data set was created by the LCPS's Department of Planning and Legislative Services to plan for classroom size and assign students to high schools.</purpose>
      <supplinf>Data are stored in the corporate ArcSDE Geodatabase as a polygon feature class.  The coordinate system is Virginia State Plane (North), Zone 4501, datum NAD83 HARN.</supplinf>
    </descript>
    <timeperd>
      <timeinfo>
        <sngdate>
          <caldate>2008</caldate>
        </sngdate>
      </timeinfo>
      <current>publication date</current>
    </timeperd>
    <status>
      <progress>Complete</progress>
      <update>Annually</update>
    </status>
    <spdom>
      <bounding>
        <westbc>-77.9000</westbc>
        <eastbc>-77.5676</eastbc>
        <northbc>39.2605</northbc>
        <southbc>38.9726</southbc>
      </bounding>
    </spdom>

      <theme>

        <themekey>High School</themekey>

        <themekey/>
      </theme>

    </keywords>

    <useconst>These data were generated for use by Loudoun County and are available to the public.  These data are intended for use at 1:2400 scale or smaller.  Acknowledgement of Loudoun County would be appreciated in products derived from this data.
Every reasonable effort has been made to assure the accuracy of these data. Loudoun County, Virginia does not assume any liability arising from the use of these data.  These data are provided without warranty of any kind, expressed or implied, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular service.  Reliance on these data is at the risk of the user.</useconst>

  <dataqual>
    <attracc>
      <attraccr>Retention of attribute accuracy throughout the coverage to geodatabase feature class conversion process was ensured by a QA/QC programmatic check.  To meet satisfactory QA/QC requirements the input coverage and output feature class must have, on a record by record basis, identical attribution when comparing all concatenated fields to all the user-defined attribution.</attraccr>
    </attracc>
    <logic>Topologically clean</logic>
    <complete>Features may have been eliminated or generalized due to scale and intended use.  To assist Loudoun County, Virginia in the maintenance of the data, please provide any information concerning discovered errors, omissions, or other discrepancies found in the data.</complete>
    <posacc>
      <horizpa>
        <horizpar>Retention of coordinate accuracy throughout the coverage to geodatabase feature class conversion process was ensured by a QA/QC programmatic check.  To meet satisfactory QA/QC requirements the input coverage and output feature class must have the same record total, and on a record by record basis, area, perimeter and length differential of less than +/- 0.5%.</horizpar>
      </horizpa>
      <vertacc>
        <vertaccr>A formal accuracy assessment of the vertical positional information in the data set has either not been conducted, or is not applicable.</vertaccr>
      </vertacc>
    </posacc>
    <lineage>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Attendance boundaries were converted from paper to digital in 1999 through online digitizing following parcel boundaries, roads, and natural features such as streams.</procdesc>
        <procdate>1999</procdate>
        <proccont>
          <cntinfo>
            <cntorgp>
              <cntorg/>
            </cntorgp>
            <cntaddr>
              <addrtype/>
              <address/>
              <city/>
              <state/>
              <postal/>
            </cntaddr>
            <cntvoice/>
          </cntinfo>
        </proccont>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>This data set was part of a batch process that converted legacy data from ArcInfo coverage in Librarian to a single-tiled ArcInfo coverage in preparation for a final conversion to ArcSDE Geodatabase Feature Classes.  Data were extracted from Librarian using the EXTRACT TOPOLOGICAL command.
        Multi-tiled data sets were extracted into multiple coverages and then combined based on the feature type(s).  Layers with both polygon and arc feature classes were processed with the Arc commands MAPJOIN and DISSOLVE.  Arc feature classes alone were processed with the Arc commands, APPEND and DISSOLVE.  Layers with both arc and point feature classes and point feature classes alone were processed with the Arc command, APPEND.  When used, the arc command, DISSOLVE, was given with the <#all> option.
        All coverages were then reprojected to HARN83 using the following .prj file specifications:
        INPUT
        PROJECTION STATEPLANE
        UNITS FEET
        ZONE 5551
        DATUM NAD27 NADCON
        PARAMETERS
        OUTPUT
        PROJECTION STATEPLANE
        UNITS FEET
        FIPSZONE 4501
        DATUM HPGN NADCON
        PARAMETERS END

        The dataset was then converted to a feature class in a geodatabase in ArcSDE.</procdesc>
        <procdate>2004</procdate>
        <proccont>
          <cntinfo>
            <cntorgp>
              <cntorg>Loudoun County, VA, Office of Mapping and Geographic Information (OMAGI)</cntorg>
            </cntorgp>
            <cntpos>GIS System Analyst</cntpos>
            <cntaddr>
              <addrtype/>
              <address/>
              <city/>
              <state/>
              <postal/>
            </cntaddr>
            <cntvoice/>
          </cntinfo>
        </proccont>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>This school zone layer has the potential for new school zones and corresponding boundary adjustments before the beginning of the current school year. This is due to new schools being opened for the new school year.</procdesc>
        <procdate>On-going</procdate>
        <proccont>
          <cntinfo>
            <cntorgp>
              <cntorg>Loudoun County, VA, OMAGI</cntorg>
            </cntorgp>
            <cntpos>GIS Analyst</cntpos>
            <cntaddr>
              <addrtype/>
              <address/>
              <city/>
              <state/>
              <postal/>
            </cntaddr>
            <cntvoice/>
          </cntinfo>
        </proccont>
      </procstep>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied from the CD obtained from Loudoun County, VA in 2008</procdesc>
        <srcused>\\GIS-VISITOR\C$\Documents and Settings\VISITOR\Desktop\GeorgeMason\pgdb_SDE_5211.mdb</srcused>
        <procdate>Unknown</procdate>
      </procstep>
    </lineage>
  </dataqual>

    <overview>
      <eaover>SCH_CODE:  An abbreviation of the school for which each zone applies.</eaover>
      <eadetcit>CODE    NAME

BRH      BROAD RUN High School
BWH     BRIAR WOODS High School
DMH      DOMINION High School
FHS       FREEDOM High School
HTH       HERITAGE High School
LCH       LOUDOUN COUNTY High School
LVH       LOUDOUN VALLEY High School 
PFH       POTOMAC FALLS High School 
PVH      PARK VIEW High School
SBH      STONE BRIDGE High School</eadetcit>
    </overview>
